featured.text: Before the disciple could recover from the 39 of hearing the little pig speak in a human voice, it continued, “Don’t kill me.
The disciple said he would do whatever his guru asked him to do.
The disciple felt sad to hear this, but he agreed to do as he was told.
Then he called his favorite disciple and asked him, “What would you do to thank me for all you have received from me?”
Then the disciple 37 his knife and picked out the little pig with a mark on its brow.

definition.zh_def: 弟子；追隨者，尤其是宗教或哲學的信徒。
definition.en_def: A person who follows the teachings of another, especially a religious or philosophical leader.
definition.example: She was a devoted disciple of the great philosopher.
